change_password.format_password_message: Please enter a new password. Your password must be alphanumeric, between 8 to 30 characters, consists of at least 1 capital letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 digit and 1 special character (@, $, !, &, etc).
change_password.old_password_incorrect: The old password you have entered is incorrect.
change_password.new_password_cant_same_old_password: New password cannot be the same as old password.
change_password.password_not_match_format: Password does not match the requested format. Please try again.
change_password.password_reset_success: Password has been reset, please login again.
change_password.repeat_password_wrong: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
